column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A ticket to travel by train is a
{{c1::train ticket}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A machine you use to get a ticket is a
{{c1::ticket machine}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
The staff at a hotel are the
{{c1::hotel staff}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
The results of your exams are your
{{c1::exam results}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A horse that runs in races is a
{{c1::racehorse|race horse}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A race for horses is a
{{c1::horse race}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A shop that sells shoes is a
{{c1::shoe shop}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
The window of a shop is the
{{c1::shop window}}.

column2: What do we call these things or people?
column3:
A person who cleans windows is a
{{c1::window cleaner}}.
